Name: Tales of Sorrow: Strawsbrough Town
About the game: Play the exciting hidden object adventurer 'Tales of Sorrow: Strawsbrough Town'. The young couple Melissa and Alfred celebrate their first wedding anniversary when Melissa puts a mysterious ring on her finger and falls into a magical sleep. Help Alfred find a cure and break the ring's curse! - Immerse yourself in the gloomy atmosphere of the small town of Strawsbrough - Solve challenging hidden object puzzles and mini games - Learn powerful spells and the secrets of alchemy - Experience the gripping story and solve the mystery of the Ring
